description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Duel is a side-view 3D action game full of shooting, jumping, fleeing, chasing, slashing, dodging, rope-swinging and trying to kill your opponent. The game shows its best when you're playing in split-screen mode with your friend. There's also challenging story mode and cooperative survival mode. Try it!
